resources.string: Welcome to HealthCheck AI. By downloading, installing, or using the application, you agree to be bound by these Terms and Conditions (hereinafter, "Terms"). If you do not agree with these Terms, you should not use the application.

HealthCheck AI is a mobile application that uses artificial intelligence to help users evaluate their health symptoms and provide possible diagnoses and personalized recommendations. The application allows users to enter their personal data and symptoms and offers additional tools for health monitoring.

To use HealthCheck AI, you must register by providing personal information, such as your name, email address, and password. You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your account and password and for all activities that occur under your account. HealthCheck AI will not be liable for any loss or damage arising from your failure to comply with this security obligation.

HealthCheck AI collects and uses personal data such as age, weight, allergies, and other relevant data to provide accurate diagnoses and recommendations. All personal data will be treated in accordance with our Privacy Policy, which can be viewed in the application.

HealthCheck AI is not a substitute for professional medical consultation. The diagnoses and recommendations provided by the application are for informational purposes only and should not be used as a basis for making medical decisions without consulting a healthcare professional. HealthCheck AI is not responsible for any damage or harm resulting from the use of the application.

All rights, titles, and interests in HealthCheck AI, including but not limited to software, text, graphics, and logos, are the exclusive property of HealthCheck AI and are protected by intellectual property laws. No rights or licenses are granted to you regarding these intellectual property rights.

HealthCheck AI reserves the right to modify or discontinue, temporarily or permanently, the service offered by the application without prior notice. We also reserve the right to modify these Terms at any time. Changes will be effective once posted in the application. Your continued use of the application after any modifications have been posted constitutes your acceptance of those changes.

We may suspend or terminate your access to the application at any time, without prior notice, if we believe you have violated these Terms or any applicable law, or for any other reason. Upon termination, all rights and licenses granted to you under these Terms will cease.

These Terms will be governed and construed in accordance with the laws of Spain, without regard to its conflict of law provisions. You agree to submit to the exclusive jurisdiction of the courts located in MÃ©rida, Spain, to resolve any dispute arising out of these Terms or the use of the application.
If you have any questions or concerns about these Terms, please contact us at sauldiazdiaz210@gmail.com.
By using HealthCheck AI, you agree to these Terms and Conditions in their entirety.
Username must be at least 6 characters
Password must be at least 8 characters
Password must contain at least one number, one letter, and one special character
